name: Kerosene
text:
Uses (3 supplies). If Kerosene has no supplies, discard it.
[action] If an enemy was defeated at this location this round, exhaust Kerosene and spend 1 supply: Heal up to 2 horror from among investigators and [[Ally]] assets at your location.
real_text:
Uses (3 supplies). If Kerosene has no supplies, discard it.
[action] If an enemy was defeated at this location this round, exhaust Kerosene and spend 1 supply: Heal up to 2 horror from among investigators and [[Ally]] assets at your location.

name: Flamethrower
text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. The enemy chosen for this attack must be the enemy engaged with you with the highest fight. You get +4 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, instead of its standard damage, you may assign up to 4 damage among enemies engaged with you (any additional damage adds to this total).
real_text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. The enemy chosen for this attack must be the enemy engaged with you with the highest fight. You get +4 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, instead of its standard damage, you may assign up to 4 damage among enemies engaged with you (any additional damage adds to this total).

name: Vantage Point
text:
Fast. Play after a location enters play or is revealed during an investigator's turn.
Until the end of the active investigator's turn, that location gets -1 shroud. You may move 1 clue to that location from any other location.
real_text:
Fast. Play after a location enters play or is revealed during an investigator's turn.
Until the end of the active investigator's turn, that location gets -1 shroud. You may move 1 clue to that location from any other location.

name: Pnakotic Manuscripts
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would perform a skill test during a revelation effect, spend 1 secret: Do not reveal chaos tokens for that test.
[action] Spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. Do not reveal chaos tokens for the next skill test that investigator performs this round.
real_text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would perform a skill test during a revelation effect, spend 1 secret: Do not reveal chaos tokens for that test.
[action] Spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. Do not reveal chaos tokens for the next skill test that investigator performs this round.

name: Borrowed Time
text: Exceptional. [action]: Place 1 resource on Borrowed Time, as a click (to a maximum of 3 clicks on Borrowed Time). Does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Forced - When your turn begins: Remove all clicks from Borrowed Time. You may take that many additional actions this turn.
real_text: Exceptional. [action]: Place 1 resource on Borrowed Time, as a click (to a maximum of 3 clicks on Borrowed Time). Does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Forced - When your turn begins: Remove all clicks from Borrowed Time. You may take that many additional actions this turn.

name: All In
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card for each point you succeeded by, to a maximum of 5. Shuffle each weakness drawn by this effect back into your deck without resolving it.
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card for each point you succeeded by, to a maximum of 5. Shuffle each weakness drawn by this effect back into your deck without resolving it.

name: Shards of the Void
text: Seal (0). Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge or release a chaos token sealed here: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. You get +2 [willpower] for this attack for each "0" token sealed on Shards of the Void. For each "0" token revealed during this attack, seal that token on Shards of the Void and this attack deals 1 additional damage.
real_text: Seal (0). Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge or release a chaos token sealed here: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. You get +2 [willpower] for this attack for each "0" token sealed on Shards of the Void. For each "0" token revealed during this attack, seal that token on Shards of the Void and this attack deals 1 additional damage.

name: Seal of the Seventh Sign
text: Seal ([auto_fail]). Uses (7 charges). If Seal of the Seventh Sign has no charges, or if it leaves play, remove it from the game. Forced - After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token is revealed during any skill test: Remove 1 charge from Seal of the Seventh Sign.
real_text: Seal ([auto_fail]). Uses (7 charges). If Seal of the Seventh Sign has no charges, or if it leaves play, remove it from the game. Forced - After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token is revealed during any skill test: Remove 1 charge from Seal of the Seventh Sign.

name: Impromptu Barrier
text: You may play Impromptu Barrier from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after resolving its effects. Evade. The chosen enemy gets -1 evade for this evasion attempt. (If you played Impromptu Barrier from your discard pile, you may evade an additional enemy at the same location with evade X or lower. X is the amount you succeed by.)
real_text: You may play Impromptu Barrier from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after resolving its effects. Evade. The chosen enemy gets -1 evade for this evasion attempt. (If you played Impromptu Barrier from your discard pile, you may evade an additional enemy at the same location with evade X or lower. X is the amount you succeed by.)

name: Alter Fate
text:
Fast. Play during any [free] player window.
Choose and discard from play a non-weakness treachery that is not attached to an [[Elite]] enemy.
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [free] player window.
Choose and discard from play a non-weakness treachery that is not attached to an [[Elite]] enemy.
flavor: We make our own fate.

name: Shattered Aeons
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -2 (-4 instead if the Relic of Ages is at your location).
[cultist]: -2. If you do not succeed by at least 1, place 1 doom on the nearest [[Cultist]] enemy.
[tablet]: -2. If you are poisoned, this test automatically fails instead.
[elder_thing]: -2. If you fail, shuffle the topmost [[Hex]] treachery in the encounter discard pile into the exploration deck.
real_text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -2 (-4 instead if the Relic of Ages is at your location).
[cultist]: -2. If you do not succeed by at least 1, place 1 doom on the nearest [[Cultist]] enemy.
[tablet]: -2. If you are poisoned, this test automatically fails instead.
[elder_thing]: -2. If you fail, shuffle the topmost [[Hex]] treachery in the encounter discard pile into the exploration deck.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -3 (-5 instead if the Relic of Ages is at your location).
[cultist]: -3. If you do not succeed by at least 1, place 1 doom on each [[Cultist]] enemy.
[tablet]: -3. If you are poisoned, this test automatically fails instead. If you are not poisoned and you fail, put a set-aside Poisoned weakness into play in your threat area.
[elder_thing]: -3. Shuffle the topmost [[Hex]] treachery in the encounter discard pile into the exploration deck.

name: Threads of Time
text: Forced - If an investigator with the Relic of Ages in his or her hand, deck, discard pile, or play area is eliminated: Immediately advance to agenda 3b.
real_text: Forced - If an investigator with the Relic of Ages in his or her hand, deck, discard pile, or play area is eliminated: Immediately advance to agenda 3b.
flavor: As you enter the grand chamber beyond the doorway, the Nexus stirs. The Earth quakes below you, and the wall chips and crumbles. Shards of stone float in midair above the Nexus. You are running out of time: Reality is starting to shatter all around you.
back_text: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Spawn the set-aside Formless Spawn in the Nexus of N'kai. Place this card in the victory display. It gains Vengeance 1.
back_flavor: You are not the first to intrude in this abyssal pit. You were warned not to break the seal, and yet here you are. Now you face the consequences for your foolish transgression. The thing emerges from the lightless void beyond the Nexus. It is a being of black polymorphic ichor, an animated viscous ooze that crawls along the ground with shapeless limbs and leaves a trail of smooth, dissolved stone in its wake.

name: Pendulous Threads
text: Forced - If an investigator with the Relic of Ages in his or her hand, deck, discard pile, or play area is eliminated: Immediately advance to agenda 3b.
real_text: Forced - If an investigator with the Relic of Ages in his or her hand, deck, discard pile, or play area is eliminated: Immediately advance to agenda 3b.
flavor:
Inside the Nexus, the interwoven
threads of ethereal light
begin to unravel, and reality
unravels with it.
back_text: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. If Formless Spawn is in play, place 2 doom on the Nexus of N'kai. If Formless Spawn is in the victory display, shuffle it into the encounter deck. Place this card in the victory display. It gains Vengeance 1.
back_flavor: The electrical currents coursing through the machinery of the Nexus begin to malfunction, sending a shower of sparks into the air. The portal ring overheats. Threads of ethereal light within the portal begin to snap.

name: Snapped Threads
text: Forced - If an investigator with the Relic of Ages in his or her hand, deck, discard pile, or play area is eliminated: Immediately advance to agenda 3b.
real_text: Forced - If an investigator with the Relic of Ages in his or her hand, deck, discard pile, or play area is eliminated: Immediately advance to agenda 3b.
flavor: .time shattered of purgatory endless awful this in forever lost is know you Everything .Terrifying .False .different are they but ,repeat on out play future and ,present ,past your from Moments .changed has continuity the ,blink you time Each .between in everything and ,reverse in ,order in out play actions Your .here got you how recall cannot you but ,occurred yet not have that things remember You .alter to continues time of flow The
back_flavor:
The timeline collapses.
Reality dissolves before your very eyes. First to vanish is the environment around you: the matter blurs and thins into strings of light that fade into an empty void.
Next comes your body: it disintegrates slowly and painlessly into hundreds of millions of subatomic particles, which diffuse throughout the vast emptiness.
Finally, your cognition: your memories of events both real and unreal. Your hopes and dreams. Thoughts that never held any significance in the infinite scheme of the cosmos.

name: Worlds Beyond
text: Forced - When an enemy would spawn at an empty location and there are no empty locations in play: Reveal cards from the exploration deck until a location is revealed. Put that location into play and spawn that enemy there. Shuffle the exploration deck.
real_text: Forced - When an enemy would spawn at an empty location and there are no empty locations in play: Reveal cards from the exploration deck until a location is revealed. Put that location into play and spawn that enemy there. Shuffle the exploration deck.
flavor: The energies of the Nexus swirl in the ground below you, beckoning you to enter. Whether it is a thing of science or magic, you do not know. It is a gateway of sorts, that much you can tell... but a gateway to where?
back_text: Shuffle the set-aside A Pocket in Time location into the exploration deck.
back_flavor: Each time you step through the Nexus, you get one step closer to your ultimate destination - a place that exists outside the boundaries of time and space...

name: Search for the Brotherhood
text: Objective - If an investigator enters A Pocket in Time, advance.
real_text: Objective - If an investigator enters A Pocket in Time, advance.
flavor: Somewhere deep within this nexus of worlds lies your objective: a place where timelines converge. You can see it in flashes of insight from beyond this reality. Windows into other timelines. A place carved out of time and space, where the Brotherhood no doubt resides.
back_text: Shuffle the set-aside [[Shattered]] locations into the exploration deck. Each investigator shuffles the topmost [[Hex]] treachery in the encounter discard pile into the exploration deck. Check Campaign Log. - If the relic is missing, attach the set-aside Relic of Ages (Unleash the Timestream) to A Pocket in Time, under no investigator's control. Advance to Act 3a - "The Yithian Relic." - If the investigators found the missing relic, advance to Act 3a - "The Yithian Relic."
back_flavor: What you see before you is truly staggering. Throughout these halls are hundreds of windows into places both ancient and futuristic: once-grand civilizations that came before even the earliest records of known history, and more still that have yet to be realized. The psychological weight of this discovery is almost more than your mind can bear. Humans are not the masters or caretakers of the Earth. They are merely a footnote in a much longer history - a history which is about to be revised.

name: The Yithian Relic
text: [action]: Search your deck or discard pile for the Relic of Ages and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. [action] If the Relic of Ages is attached to your location and there are no clues on that location: Take control of the Relic of Ages. Objective - If an investigator controls the Relic of Ages, advance.
real_text: [action]: Search your deck or discard pile for the Relic of Ages and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. [action] If the Relic of Ages is attached to your location and there are no clues on that location: Take control of the Relic of Ages. Objective - If an investigator controls the Relic of Ages, advance.
flavor: If you intend to mend the shattered timelines, you will need to find the Relic of Ages and learn to harness its power.
back_text:
For the remainder of the scenario, if the Relic of Ages leaves play for any reason, shuffle each location attached to it into the exploration deck and reset the act deck to act 3a.
Check Campaign Log. If Ichtaca is set against you:
The thing that was once your companion slithers out of the darkness, hissing. "Yig will have his way! Valusia will be returned to us!"
Spawn the set-aside Ichtaca (Scion of Yig) in the Nexus of N'kai.
If Alejandro is set against you:
"Fools! Are you blind?" Alejandro motions to the worlds before him. "Your kind stands no chance against the ravages of time."
Spawn the set-aside Alejandro (Or, Is He?) in A Pocket in Time.
back_flavor: In your hands, you hold the key to fixing all of this. It hums and vibrates with immense power - power that seems to grow and flourish as you visit other timelines.

name: Mend the Shatter
text: [action] If you are at a [[Shattered]] location with no clues: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, attach your location facedown to the Relic of Ages. Each investigator and enemy at that location is moved to A Pocket in Time. Objective - If the number of locations attached to the Relic of Ages is equal to 1 plus the number of investigators who started the game, advance.
real_text: [action] If you are at a [[Shattered]] location with no clues: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, attach your location facedown to the Relic of Ages. Each investigator and enemy at that location is moved to A Pocket in Time. Objective - If the number of locations attached to the Relic of Ages is equal to 1 plus the number of investigators who started the game, advance.
flavor: Each window you step through seems to empower the relic. Once the artifact is fully powered, you can use it to mend the shattered timelines and prevent catastrophe.
back_text: - If Relic of Ages (Repossess the Past) is the version of the Relic of Ages that the investigators control, proceed to (→R5). - If the investigators control any other version of the Relic of Ages, proceed to (→R1).
back_flavor: You manipulate the thrumming device in your hands with the skill and knowledge of one of the relic's ingenious inventors. It is as though your mind has suddenly become flooded with the knowledge of the ancients that came before you. Power seeps from the device's every aperture. Rays of blinding light shoot forth from cracks appearing on its surface. You only have one chance to restore these shattered realities - only one chance to make things right.

name: Paradise Lost
text: [action] If you are at a [[Shattered]] location with no clues: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, attach your location facedown to the Relic of Ages. Each investigator and enemy at that location is moved to A Pocket in Time. Objective - If Valusia is attached to the Relic of Ages, advance.
real_text: [action] If you are at a [[Shattered]] location with no clues: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, attach your location facedown to the Relic of Ages. Each investigator and enemy at that location is moved to A Pocket in Time. Objective - If Valusia is attached to the Relic of Ages, advance.
flavor: Each window you step through seems to empower the relic. Once the artifact is fully powered, will you use it to restore the serpent civilization of Valusia to its former glory?
back_flavor:
Ichtaca observes you with narrow yellow eyes as you manipulate the thrumming device in your hands. Power seeps from the device's every aperture. Rays of blinding light shoot forth from the cracks appearing on its surface. You watch as the boundary between timelines begins to mend, and the window closes, trapping you within the time and place you have chosen. Once the deed is done, the light fades from the artifact. Its humming ceases, and it never sounds again.
A beautiful yellow sun rises over the lush kingdom of Valusia, and you wonder what to make of your new life.

name: Timelock
text: [action] If you are at a [[Shattered]] location with no clues: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, attach your location facedown to the Relic of Ages. Each investigator and enemy at that location is moved to A Pocket in Time. Objective - If Pnakotus is attached to the Relic of Ages, advance.
real_text: [action] If you are at a [[Shattered]] location with no clues: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, attach your location facedown to the Relic of Ages. Each investigator and enemy at that location is moved to A Pocket in Time. Objective - If Pnakotus is attached to the Relic of Ages, advance.
flavor: Each window you step through seems to empower the relic. Once the artifact is fully powered, will you use it to prevent the destruction of Pnakotus and the Yithians?
back_flavor:
Alejandro studies your every move as you manipulate the thrumming device in your hands. Power seeps from the device's every aperture. Rays of blinding light shoot forth from the cracks appearing on its surface. You watch as the boundary between timelines begins to mend, and the window closes, trapping you within the time and place you have chosen. Once the deed is done, the light fades from the artifact. Its humming ceases, and it never sounds again.
"Come, my friend," Alejandro says stoically, motioning toward the tallest basalt tower of the city of endless archives. "Now our work can truly begin."

name: Nexus of N'kai
text: Forced - After you move from Nexus of N'kai to an [[Otherworld]] location, or vice versa: Take 1 horror for each clue on that [[Otherworld]] location. [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Do not take horror from the above Forced ability when moving via this effect.
real_text: Forced - After you move from Nexus of N'kai to an [[Otherworld]] location, or vice versa: Take 1 horror for each clue on that [[Otherworld]] location. [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Do not take horror from the above Forced ability when moving via this effect.
back_flavor: At the center of the chamber lies the Nexus: a bottomless pit in the Earth, ringed by futuristic machinery no doubt built by those who came before humanity. Inside this pit is a swirling soup of eldritch energy; glowing strands of ethereal light that ripple, fold, and weave among one another. As you approach, a fragment of stone chips from the brim and falls into the portal, vanishing from existence.

name: Yig's Mercy
text:
Check Campaign Log. If there are 16 or more tally marks under "Yig's Fury": Ichtaca refuses your plea. Flip this card back over. If there are 15 or fewer tally marks:
Ichtaca ceases her assault and listens to your words. "Valusia must be returned to glory. There is no other way," she decrees with bitter certainty. "Help us to achieve this goal, and you can join with us. Yig will remake you in his image, and we shall live together in our timeless paradise of Valusia."
The investigators must decide (choose one): - "I could never turn my back on humanity!" Flip this card back over, exhausted and unengaged. For the remainder of the scenario, you cannot parley with Ichtaca. - "I accept." Remove this card and Act 4a - "Mend the Shatter" from the game and advance to the set-aside Act 4a - "Paradise Lost". For the remainder of the scenario, you cannot parley with Alejandro Vela, and [[Serpent]] enemies do not engage or attack you.
real_text:
Check Campaign Log. If there are 16 or more tally marks under "Yig's Fury": Ichtaca refuses your plea. Flip this card back over. If there are 15 or fewer tally marks:
Ichtaca ceases her assault and listens to your words. "Valusia must be returned to glory. There is no other way," she decrees with bitter certainty. "Help us to achieve this goal, and you can join with us. Yig will remake you in his image, and we shall live together in our timeless paradise of Valusia."
The investigators must decide (choose one): - "I could never turn my back on humanity!" Flip this card back over, exhausted and unengaged. For the remainder of the scenario, you cannot parley with Ichtaca. - "I accept." Remove this card and Act 4a - "Mend the Shatter" from the game and advance to the set-aside Act 4a - "Paradise Lost". For the remainder of the scenario, you cannot parley with Alejandro Vela, and [[Serpent]] enemies do not engage or attack you.

linked_card.name: Ichtaca
linked_card.text:
Hunter. Retaliate

: Parley. Test (5) to plead for your life. If a symbol is revealed during this test, you automatically succeed. If you fail, Ichtaca attacks you. If you succeed, flip this card over and resolve its text.
linked_card.real_text: Hunter. Retaliate [action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (5) to plead for your life. If a [cultist] symbol is revealed during this test, you automatically succeed. If you fail, Ichtaca attacks you. If you succeed, flip this card over and resolve its text.

name: Another Way
text: The investigators must decide (choose one): - "I could never turn my back on humanity!" Flip this card back over, exhausted and unengaged. For the remainder of the scenario, you cannot parley with Alejandro Vela. - "I accept." Remove this card and Act 4 - "Mend the Shatter" from the game and advance to the set-aside Act 4a - "Timelock". For the remainder of the scenario, you cannot parley with Ichtaca, and [[Cultist]] enemies do not engage or attack you.
real_text: The investigators must decide (choose one): - "I could never turn my back on humanity!" Flip this card back over, exhausted and unengaged. For the remainder of the scenario, you cannot parley with Alejandro Vela. - "I accept." Remove this card and Act 4 - "Mend the Shatter" from the game and advance to the set-aside Act 4a - "Timelock". For the remainder of the scenario, you cannot parley with Ichtaca, and [[Cultist]] enemies do not engage or attack you.
flavor: Alejandro - if it is really him beneath that guise of humanity - contemplates your words. "Very well. We will spare you, but only if you assist the Brotherhood." He motions to the gateways all around you. "Your kind was not the first to inherit the Earth. You know this, now, from your travels. We tried to get you to understand, but in your stubbornness, you would not listen. Hear me now. The creatures that drove us to ruin will return. They will wipe humanity off this planet, and the only evidence of your existence will live on in Pnakotus. But together we can stop them. Join us, and you may yet save the Earth - and yourselves.

linked_card.name: Alejandro Vela
linked_card.text:
Alert. Hunter.

: Parley. Test (5) to plead for your life. If a symbol is revealed during this test, you automatically succeed. If you fail, Alejandro Vela attacks you. If you succeed, flip this card over and resolve its text.
linked_card.real_text: Alert. Hunter. [action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (5) to plead for your life. If a [tablet] symbol is revealed during this test, you automatically succeed. If you fail, Alejandro Vela attacks you. If you succeed, flip this card over and resolve its text.

name: Yuggoth
text: [action]: Flip a clue on Yuggoth to its doom side. Draw 1 card.
real_text: [action]: Flip a clue on Yuggoth to its doom side. Draw 1 card.
flavor: It is a strange dark orb at the very rim of our solar system - unknown to earthly astronomers as yet. - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Whisperer in Darkness</u>

name: Shores of R'lyeh
text: Shores of R'lyeh gets +1 shroud for each doom on each card in Shores of R'lyeh (including itself). Forced - After Shores of R'lyeh enters play: Place 1 doom on it.
real_text: Shores of R'lyeh gets +1 shroud for each doom on each card in Shores of R'lyeh (including itself). Forced - After Shores of R'lyeh enters play: Place 1 doom on it.
flavor: The great stone city R’lyeh, with its monoliths and sepulchres, had sunk beneath the waves... - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Call of Cthulhu</u>

name: City of the Unseen
text: Forced - After 1 or more doom is placed on a [[Cultist]] enemy at City of the Unseen: Place 1 additional doom on that enemy.
real_text: Forced - After 1 or more doom is placed on a [[Cultist]] enemy at City of the Unseen: Place 1 additional doom on that enemy.
flavor:
There are secrets in the cosmos better left unknown.
But once your Eyes are open, you will truly See.

name: A Pocket in Time
text: Forced - After you move from A Pocket in Time to a [[Shattered]] location, or vice versa: Take 1 damage for each clue on that [[Shattered]] location. [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Do not take damage from the above Forced ability when moving via this effect.
real_text: Forced - After you move from A Pocket in Time to a [[Shattered]] location, or vice versa: Take 1 damage for each clue on that [[Shattered]] location. [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Do not take damage from the above Forced ability when moving via this effect.

name: Ruins of New York
text: Forced - After Ruins of New York enters play: Put the top card of the lead investigator's deck into play at this location, facedown (2 cards instead if there are 3 or 4 investigators in the game). Treat each of those cards as Flying Polyp enemies with 2 fight, 2 health, 2 evade, 1 damage, and the [[Monster]] trait.
real_text: Forced - After Ruins of New York enters play: Put the top card of the lead investigator's deck into play at this location, facedown (2 cards instead if there are 3 or 4 investigators in the game). Treat each of those cards as Flying Polyp enemies with 2 fight, 2 health, 2 evade, 1 damage, and the [[Monster]] trait.

name: Mu
text: While you are at Mu, the first [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol you reveal during each skill test gains: "Reveal another token."
real_text: While you are at Mu, the first [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol you reveal during each skill test gains: "Reveal another token."
flavor: ...till at last on a hideous day of storm and thunder, terrific rumbling, and mountain-high waves, all the land of Mu sank into the sea forever. - H. P. Lovecraft and Hazel Heald, <u>Out of the Aeons</u>

name: Atlantis
text: Forced - After an [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during a skill test at any location: Place 1 doom on Atlantis. Then, if there are 3 or more doom on Atlantis, remove it from the game. Each enemy and investigator that was at Atlantis is defeated.
real_text: Forced - After an [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during a skill test at any location: Place 1 doom on Atlantis. Then, if there are 3 or more doom on Atlantis, remove it from the game. Each enemy and investigator that was at Atlantis is defeated.

name: Pnakotus
text: [action] If there are at least 3 [tablet] tokens in the chaos bag or sealed on cards in play: Discover all of the clues on Pnakotus and draw that many cards. (Group limit once per game.)
real_text: [action] If there are at least 3 [tablet] tokens in the chaos bag or sealed on cards in play: Discover all of the clues on Pnakotus and draw that many cards. (Group limit once per game.)

name: Valusia
text: [action] If there are at least 3 [cultist] tokens in the chaos bag or sealed on cards in play: Heal 2 damage and 2 horror. Set Valusia's shroud to 0 for the remainder of the game. (Group limit once per game.)
real_text: [action] If there are at least 3 [cultist] tokens in the chaos bag or sealed on cards in play: Heal 2 damage and 2 horror. Set Valusia's shroud to 0 for the remainder of the game. (Group limit once per game.)

name: Plateau of Leng
text: Forced - If you reveal an [elder_thing] symbol during a skill test at Plateau of Leng: Take 1 horror.
real_text: Forced - If you reveal an [elder_thing] symbol during a skill test at Plateau of Leng: Take 1 horror.
flavor: …the conviction grew upon us that this hideous upland must indeed be the fabled nightmare plateau of Leng which even the mad author of the <u>Necronomicon</u> was reluctant to discuss. - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>At the Mountains of Madness</u>

name: Formless Spawn
text: Spawn - Nexus of N'kai. Massive. Formless Spawn cannot move or be moved. Formless Spawn gets +1 fight and +1 evade for each doom on each card in Nexus of N'kai (including Nexus of N'Kai).
real_text: Spawn - Nexus of N'kai. Massive. Formless Spawn cannot move or be moved. Formless Spawn gets +1 fight and +1 evade for each doom on each card in Nexus of N'kai (including Nexus of N'Kai).
flavor: ...they found living things - living things that oozed along stone channels and worshipped onyx and basalt images of Tsathoggua. - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Mound</u>

name: Temporal Devourer
text: Spawn - Farthest [[Shattered]] or [[Extradimensional]] location. If there are no such locations in play, Temporal Devourer gains surge. Hunter. Forced - After Temporal Devourer enters a [[Shattered]] or [[Extradimensional]] location: Place 1 clue on that location (from the token pool).
real_text: Spawn - Farthest [[Shattered]] or [[Extradimensional]] location. If there are no such locations in play, Temporal Devourer gains surge. Hunter. Forced - After Temporal Devourer enters a [[Shattered]] or [[Extradimensional]] location: Place 1 clue on that location (from the token pool).

name: Shattered Ages
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, place 1 clue (from the token pool) on each location other than Nexus of N'kai.
real_text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, place 1 clue (from the token pool) on each location other than Nexus of N'kai.
flavor: If you do not mend the shattered boundaries of time, this may be all that is left of our world.

name: Between Worlds
text: Revelation - Put Between Worlds into play as an [[Otherworld]] location with 3 shroud and 1 clue, and move to it. It is connected to the Nexus of N'kai. (If drawn from the exploration deck, this exploration is still considered unsuccessful.) Forced - At the end of the round: Each investigator here takes 1 damage and 1 horror. If there are no investigators in this location, discard it and move each enemy here to Nexus of N'kai.
real_text: Revelation - Put Between Worlds into play as an [[Otherworld]] location with 3 shroud and 1 clue, and move to it. It is connected to the Nexus of N'kai. (If drawn from the exploration deck, this exploration is still considered unsuccessful.) Forced - At the end of the round: Each investigator here takes 1 damage and 1 horror. If there are no investigators in this location, discard it and move each enemy here to Nexus of N'kai.

name: Wracked by Time
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). Each investigator at a [[Shattered]] location must also perform this skill test. Each investigator who fails takes 2 damage. Each asset assigned damage by this effect that is not defeated is shuffled into its owner's deck.
real_text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). Each investigator at a [[Shattered]] location must also perform this skill test. Each investigator who fails takes 2 damage. Each asset assigned damage by this effect that is not defeated is shuffled into its owner's deck.

name: Creeping Darkness
text: Revelation - Attach to Nexus of N'kai. Place 1 doom on Creeping Darkness. Formless Spawn gets +1 [per_investigator] health. [action] [action]: Test [willpower] (3) or check your supplies. If you succeed, or if you have torches, Discard Creeping Shadows.
real_text: Revelation - Attach to Nexus of N'kai. Place 1 doom on Creeping Darkness. Formless Spawn gets +1 [per_investigator] health. [action] [action]: Test [willpower] (3) or check your supplies. If you succeed, or if you have torches, Discard Creeping Shadows.

name: Relic of Ages
text: Forced - After you resolve a treachery while exploring: Shuffle that treachery back into the exploration deck instead of discarding it.
real_text: Forced - After you resolve a treachery while exploring: Shuffle that treachery back into the exploration deck instead of discarding it.
flavor: The device undulates in your hands, its power overflowing, uncontrolled. The air around you is warped, as though time and space around you is twisting, distorting...

name: Turn Back Time
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X . X is the number of locations with doom on them.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, place 1 doom on your location.
real_text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X . X is the number of locations with doom on them.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, place 1 doom on your location.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X . X is the total amount of doom on locations.
[elder_thing]: -6. Place 1 doom on your location.

name: Into the Ruins Once Again
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it.
real_text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it.
flavor: Despite everything that has occurred since you were last here, the Eztli temple remains the same as it was when you first explored it, preserved in an echo of time. You use your memories to guide you, heading deeper into the ruins once more.
back_text: Shuffle the set-aside Chamber of Time location into the exploration deck. Place this act in the victory display. It gains Vengeance 2.
back_flavor: You pass by carvings in the walls and hieroglyphs etched into stone altars. The location of the relic's vault is already locked deep in your memory.

name: The Chamber of Still Remains
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Objective - Only investigators in the Chamber of Time may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.
real_text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Objective - Only investigators in the Chamber of Time may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.
flavor: In the central chamber deep within the core of the ruins, the relic awaits.
back_text: Choose an investigator in the Chamber of Time to take control of the Relic of Ages. Search the collection for Yig (The Forgotten Age card #296). Spawn it in the Chamber of Time. Place this act in the victory display. It gains Vengeance 2.
back_flavor: The relic hums with power and throbs in your hands. Energy from the device seeps into the corridors of the ruins, and the structure of the temple shifts. However, this does not matter to you. Escaping with the relic is no longer your goal. You skillfully work the hidden components of the device once more, manipulating the very fabric of time in the environment around you. Determined to stop all of this from having ever occurred, you turn the clock back once more.

name: Moment of Doom
text: Relic of Ages gains: "[action]: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (4). If you succeed, flip a clue controlled by an investigator at your location to its doom side, and place it on your location. Then, deal 3 damage to Yig." Objective - If Yig is defeated, advance.
real_text: Relic of Ages gains: "[action]: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (4). If you succeed, flip a clue controlled by an investigator at your location to its doom side, and place it on your location. Then, deal 3 damage to Yig." Objective - If Yig is defeated, advance.
flavor: You stand in the center of the relic’s vault, surrounded on all sides by slain Eztli warriors. The Father of Serpents stands before you, his hiss shaking you to your bones. This is where the Eztli made their last stand. Now, only you stand in the creature’s way.
back_flavor: The creature roars in pain. His tail thrashes violently, crushing several pillars and sending you flying to the ground. He retreats with a hateful, rumbling hiss. You turn your attention back to the relic and the chamber that was built to preserve it. It is time to end this, once and for all. It is time to do what must be done.
